d037ecb7-26cb-4ea5-8a9d-71381d793be6.description: Earners of the Solve for Tomorrow: Next Gen badge have completed an interactive design thinking sprint, focusing on creating innovative ideas that explore the use of technology to make the world a better and more sustainable place. Badge earners developed insight of creative tech job roles, encompassing research & development, design, sales, and marketing. They built out their own sustainable tech ideas from an initial concept and submitted their entries as part of a nationwide competition.
d037ecb7-26cb-4ea5-8a9d-71381d793be6.name: Solve for Tomorrow: Next Gen 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Developed and submitted their own sustainable tech idea as part of a nationwide competition

e24fecdf-a1d9-4131-8601-767668bd3b57.description: Samsung UK's Solve for Tomorrow is a year-round hive of events, learning courses, community activity & opportunity designed to support young people (16-25) in turning their tech-for-good ideas into a reality. Learners build the confidence, connections and skills they need to take action & change the world for the better. This accreditation is awarded exclusively to learners who attend a combination of two activities; a Future Talk event, Future Lab workshop or Tech Lab workshop.
e24fecdf-a1d9-4131-8601-767668bd3b57.name: Solve for Tomorrow UK

badge_template_activities.title: Attended one of Samsung UK's Solve for Tomorrow Future Talks – live in Samsung KX, London. Learning first-hand from the people transforming the world through technology in education, sustainability, diversity and social isolation. As a result, earners gained: Increased motivation to take action about a social issue, increased problem-solving skills, increased understanding of where to go to seek support in realising their ideas and confidence to collaborate with a network of like-minded peers .

Attended a Future Lab – an intimate workshop hosted by Samsung UK Solve for Tomorrow resident mentors to develop the confidence, connections and skills required to turn ideas for social change into reality. As a result, earners gained an increase in; motivation to take action about a social issue, problem-solving skills, teamwork skills, design-thinking skills, technology design skills, understanding of where to seek support in realising their ideas and confidence to collaborate with others.

Attended a Tech Lab - An exclusive workshop hosted by resident Tech Advisor, Alex Fefegha. Alex will help learners imagine the possibilities of technology for social change, introduce them to tools to develop tech ideas and connect them to community of support. You’ll leave feeling ready to take action and clear about how to bring your idea to life.

7b9e6cc1-d88e-4bb3-a79e-e25a091d2c29.description: Earners of the Solve for Tomorrow: Next Gen badge have completed an interactive design thinking sprint, focusing on creating innovative ideas that explore the use of technology to make the world a better and more sustainable place. Badge earners developed insight of creative tech job roles, encompassing research & development, design, sales, and marketing. They built out their own sustainable tech ideas and submitted their entries as part of a nation-wide competition to come in second place.
7b9e6cc1-d88e-4bb3-a79e-e25a091d2c29.name: 2nd Prize Winner - Solve for Tomorrow: Next Gen 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Developed and submitted their own sustainable tech idea as part of a nationwide competition
